blocks.name: psgndmfi
blocks.content: For a finite base set, the permutation sign is defined for all permutations. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm psgndmfi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wfn(c1, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cpsgn, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, cfv(csymg, c0)))
} = {
  mpbii(wcel(c0, cfn), wfn(c1, c2), wfn(c1, crab(hs0, c2, wcel(cdm(cdif(cv(hs0), cid)), cfn))))
  psgnfn(hs0, c1, crab(hs0, c2, wcel(cdm(cdif(cv(hs0), cid)), cfn)), cfv(csymg, c0), c0, c2)
  eqid(crab(hs0, c2, wcel(cdm(cdif(cv(hs0), cid)), cfn)))
  fneq2d(c1, crab(hs0, c2, wcel(cdm(cdif(cv(hs0), cid)), cfn)), c2, wcel(c0, cfn))
  eqcomd(crab(hs0, c2, wcel(cdm(cdif(cv(hs0), cid)), cfn)), c2, wcel(c0, cfn))
  sylibr(wcel(c0, cfn), wceq(c2, crab(hs0, c2, wcel(cdm(cdif(cv(hs0), cid)), cfn))), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(cdm(cdif(cv(hs0), cid)), cfn)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c2, wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(cdm(cdif(cv(hs0), cid)), cfn))
  sygbasnfpfi(c0, cv(hs0), c2, cfv(csymg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(csymg, c0))
  rabid2(hs0, c2, wcel(cdm(cdif(cv(hs0), cid)), cfn))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfn))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm psgndmfi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Fin → c1[Fn]c2)
  ⊣ c1 =(pmSgn ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base `(SymGrp ` c0))
} = {
  mpbii(c0 ∈ Fin, c1[Fn]c2, c1[Fn]{ hs0 ∈ c2 | dom((hs0 \ =))∈ Fin })
  psgnfn(hs0, c1, { hs0 ∈ c2 | dom((hs0 \ =))∈ Fin }, (SymGrp ` c0), c0, c2)
  eqid({ hs0 ∈ c2 | dom((hs0 \ =))∈ Fin })
  fneq2d(c1, { hs0 ∈ c2 | dom((hs0 \ =))∈ Fin }, c2, c0 ∈ Fin)
  eqcomd({ hs0 ∈ c2 | dom((hs0 \ =))∈ Fin }, c2, c0 ∈ Fin)
  sylibr(c0 ∈ Fin, c2 = { hs0 ∈ c2 | dom((hs0 \ =))∈ Fin }, ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, dom((hs0 \ =))∈ Fin))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c2, c0 ∈ Fin, dom((hs0 \ =))∈ Fin)
  sygbasnfpfi(c0, hs0, c2, (SymGrp ` c0))
  eqid((SymGrp ` c0))
  rabid2(hs0, c2, dom((hs0 \ =))∈ Fin)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ Fin)
}

blocks.name: psgnid
blocks.content: Permutation sign of the identity. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm psgnid(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wceq(cfv(c1, cres(cid, c0)), nat1))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cpsgn, c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(c1, cres(cid, c0)), nat1, cfv(c1, cfv(c0g, cfv(csymg, c0))), wcel(c0, cfn))
  fveq2d(c1, cres(cid, c0), cfv(c0g, cfv(csymg, c0)), wcel(c0, cfn))
  symgid(c0, cfn, cfv(csymg, c0))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfn), wceq(cfv(c1, cfv(c0g, cfv(csymg, c0))), nat1), wcel(c1, co(cfv(csymg, c0), cghm, co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))))))
  psgnghm2(c0, c1, cfv(csymg, c0), co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))))
  eqid(cfv(csymg, c0))
  ghmid(c1, cfv(csymg, c0), co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))), cfv(c0g, cfv(csymg, c0)), nat1)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, cfv(csymg, c0)))
  mp3an(wceq(nat1, cfv(c0g, co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))))), wcel(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cmnd), wcel(nat1, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))), wss(cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cc))
  ax-mp(wcel(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cmnd), wcel(ccnfld, crg))
  cnring()
  ringmgp(ccnfld, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))
  prid1(nat1, cneg(nat1))
  1ex()
  mp2an(wss(cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cc), wcel(nat1, cc), wcel(cneg(nat1), cc))
  negcli(nat1)
  ax-1cn()
  prssi(nat1, cc, cneg(nat1))
  ress0g(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), nat1, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1)), cc, co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))))
  eqid(co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cpr(nat1, cneg(nat1))))
  mgpbas(cc, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), ccnfld)
  cnfldbas()
  ringidval(nat1, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), ccnfld)
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))
  cnfld1()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm psgnid(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Fin →(c1 `(= |` c0))= 1)
  ⊣ c1 =(pmSgn ` c0)
} = {
  eqtrd((c1 `(= |` c0)), nat1, (c1 `(0 `(SymGrp ` c0))), c0 ∈ Fin)
  fveq2d(c1, (= |` c0), (0 `(SymGrp ` c0)), c0 ∈ Fin)
  symgid(c0, cfn, (SymGrp ` c0))
  syl(c0 ∈ Fin, (c1 `(0 `(SymGrp ` c0)))= 1, c1 ∈((SymGrp ` c0)[GrpHom]((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)})))
  psgnghm2(c0, c1, (SymGrp ` c0), ((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)}))
  eqid((SymGrp ` c0))
  ghmid(c1, (SymGrp ` c0), ((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)}), (0 `(SymGrp ` c0)), nat1)
  eqid((0 `(SymGrp ` c0)))
  mp3an(1 =(0 `((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)})), (mulGrp ` CCfld)∈ Mnd, 1 ∈ { 1, -u(1)}, { 1, -u(1)} ⊆ ℂ)
  ax-mp((mulGrp ` CCfld)∈ Mnd, CCfld ∈ Ring)
  cnring()
  ringmgp(ccnfld, (mulGrp ` CCfld))
  prid1(nat1, -u(1))
  1ex()
  mp2an({ 1, -u(1)} ⊆ ℂ, 1 ∈ ℂ, -u(1)∈ ℂ)
  negcli(nat1)
  ax-1cn()
  prssi(nat1, cc, -u(1))
  ress0g((mulGrp ` CCfld), nat1, { 1, -u(1)}, cc, ((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)}))
  eqid(((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s]{ 1, -u(1)}))
  mgpbas(cc, (mulGrp ` CCfld), ccnfld)
  cnfldbas()
  ringidval(nat1, (mulGrp ` CCfld), ccnfld)
  eqid((mulGrp ` CCfld))
  cnfld1()
}

blocks.name: pmtrprfv2
blocks.content: In a transposition of two given points, each maps to the other. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm pmtrprfv2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wne(c2, c3))), wceq(cfv(cfv(c4, cpr(c2, c3)), c3), c2))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cpmtr, c0))
} = {
  syl5eqr(cfv(cfv(c4, cpr(c2, c3)), c3), c2, cfv(cfv(c4, cpr(c3, c2)), c3), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wne(c2, c3))))
  fveq1i(cfv(c4, cpr(c3, c2)), c3, cfv(c4, cpr(c2, c3)))
  fveq2i(c4, cpr(c3, c2), cpr(c2, c3))
  prcom(c3, c2)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wne(c2, c3))), wceq(cfv(cfv(c4, cpr(c3, c2)), c3), c2), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c3, c0), wcel(c2, c0), wne(c3, c2))))
  anim2i(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wne(c2, c3)), w3a(wcel(c3, c0), wcel(c2, c0), wne(c3, c2)))
  biimpi(w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wne(c2, c3)), w3a(wcel(c3, c0), wcel(c2, c0), wne(c3, c2)))
  3bitr4i(w3a(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wne(c2, c3)), w3a(wcel(c3, c0), wcel(c2, c0), wne(c3, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wne(c2, c3)), wa(wa(wcel(c3, c0), wcel(c2, c0)), wne(c3, c2)))
  anbi12i(wa(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wne(c2, c3), wa(wcel(c3, c0), wcel(c2, c0)), wne(c3, c2))
  ancom(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0))
  necom(c2, c3)
  df-3an(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wne(c2, c3))
  df-3an(wcel(c3, c0), wcel(c2, c0), wne(c3, c2))
  pmtrprfv(c0, c1, c3, c2, c4)
}

  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1)), wcel(c1, cfn))

  prssi(c0, c1, co(c0, caddc, nat1))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1)), wbr(cpr(c0, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cen, c2o), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1), wne(c0, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))
  syl6eleqr(c0, c1, co(nat1, cfz, c3), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1)))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1)), wcel(c0, co(nat1, cfz, c3)), w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c3, cn), wbr(c0, cle, c3)))
  3jca(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1)), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c3, cn), wbr(c0, cle, c3))
  letrd(c0, c3, co(c0, caddc, nat1), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1)))
  readdcld(c0, nat1, wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1)))
  1red(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1)))
  nnred(c3, wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1)))
  simp2d(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1)), wcel(c3, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cn), wbr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cle, c3))
  lep1d(c0, wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1)))
  simp3d(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1)), wbr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cle, c3), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cn), wcel(c3, cn))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1)), w3a(wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cn), wcel(c3, cn), wbr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cle, c3)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), co(nat1, cfz, c3)))
  syl6eleq(co(c0, caddc, nat1), co(nat1, cfz, c3), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1)))
  elfz1b(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c3)
  elfz1b(c0, c3)
  simpr(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1))
  ltned(c0, co(c0, caddc, nat1), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1)))
  ltp1d(c0, wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1)))
  nnred(c0, wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1))
  pr2nelem(c0, c1, co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1)
  pmtrrn(c1, cfn, cpr(c0, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), c2, crn(c2))
  eqid(crn(c2))
}

blocks.name: psgnfzto1stlem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ psgnfzto1st . Our permutation of rank ` ( n + 1 ) ` can be written as a permutation of rank ` n ` composed with a transposition. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm psgnfzto1stlem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1)), wceq(cmpt(s0, c1, cif(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cif(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cv(s0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wceq(cv(s0), nat1))), ccom(cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c1), cpr(c0, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), cmpt(s0, c1, cif(c0, cif(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cv(s0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0)), wceq(cv(s0), nat1))))))
  -| wceq(c1, co(nat1, cfz, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqfnfvd(hs0, cmpt(s0, c1, cif(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cif(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cv(s0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wceq(cv(s0), nat1))), ccom(cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c1), cpr(c0, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), cmpt(s0, c1, cif(c0, cif(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cv(s0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0)), wceq(cv(s0), nat1)))), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1)), wfn(cmpt(s0, c1, cif(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cif(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cv(s0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wceq(cv(s0), nat1))), c1))
  fnmpti(s0, cmpt(s0, c1, cif(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cif(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cv(s0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wceq(cv(s0), nat1))), c1, cif(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cif(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cv(s0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wceq(cv(s0), nat1)))
  ifex(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cif(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cv(s0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wceq(cv(s0), nat1))
  ifex(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cv(s0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))
  ovex(cv(s0), cmin, nat1)
  vex(s0)
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1)), wfn(ccom(cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c1), cpr(c0, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), cmpt(s0, c1, cif(c0, cif(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cv(s0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0)), wceq(cv(s0), nat1)))), c1), wfn(cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c1), cpr(c0, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), c1), wfn(cmpt(s0, c1, cif(c0, cif(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cv(s0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0)), wceq(cv(s0), nat1))), c1), wss(crn(cmpt(s0, c1, cif(c0, cif(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cv(s0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0)), wceq(cv(s0), nat1)))), c1))
  3syl(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1)), wfn(cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c1), cpr(c0, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), c1), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c1), cpr(c0, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), crn(cfv(cpmtr, c1))), wf1o(cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c1), cpr(c0, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), c1, c1))
  pmtrto1cl(c0, c1, cfv(cpmtr, c1), c2)
  pmtrff1o(cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c1), cpr(c0, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), crn(cfv(cpmtr, c1)), c1, cfv(cpmtr, c1))
  eqid(crn(cfv(cpmtr, c1)))
  f1ofn(cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c1), cpr(c0, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), c1, c1)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1)), wfn(cmpt(s0, c1, cif(c0, cif(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cv(s0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0)), wceq(cv(s0), nat1))), c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cif(c0, cif(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cv(s0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0)), wceq(cv(s0), nat1)), c1)))
  fnmpt(s0, c1, cif(c0, cif(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cv(s0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0)), wceq(cv(s0), nat1)), c1, cmpt(s0, c1, cif(c0, cif(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cv(s0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0)), wceq(cv(s0), nat1))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1)), wss(crn(cmpt(s0, c1, cif(c0, cif(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cv(s0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0)), wceq(cv(s0), nat1)))), c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cif(c0, cif(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cv(s0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0)), wceq(cv(s0), nat1)), c1)))
  rnmptss(s0, c1, cif(c0, cif(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cv(s0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0)), wceq(cv(s0), nat1)), c1, cmpt(s0, c1, cif(c0, cif(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cv(s0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0)), wceq(cv(s0), nat1))))

thm fzto1stfv1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, nat1), c0)), diffsc(s0, c3))
  fvmptd3(s0, c2, nat1, c0, c1, cif(c0, cif(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cv(s0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0)), wceq(cv(s0), nat1)), c1, wcel(c0, c1))

blocks.pretty:
thm fzto1stfv1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c2 ` 1)= c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(1[...]c3)
  ⊣ c2 =(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ if(s0 = 1, c0, if(s0[≤]c0,(s0[-]1), s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ c1 →(c2 ` 1)= c0), d(s0, c3))
  fvmptd3(s0, c2, nat1, c0, c1, if(s0 = 1, c0, if(s0[≤]c0,(s0[-]1), s0)), c1, c0 ∈ c1)
  iftrue(c0, if(s0[≤]c0,(s0[-]1), s0), s0 = 1)
  syl(c0 ∈ c1, 1 ∈ c1, c3 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 1))
  eleq2s(c0, c1, (1[...]c3), c3 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 1))
  elfzuz2(c0, nat1, c3)
  syl6eleqr(nat1, c1, (1[...]c3), c3 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 1))
  eluzfz1(c3, nat1)
  id(c0 ∈ c1)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: fzto1stinvn
blocks.content: Value of the inverse of our permutation ` P ` at ` I ` (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm fzto1stinvn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(ccnv(c2), c0), nat1))
  -| wceq(c1, co(nat1, cfz, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, c1, cif(c0, cif(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cv(s0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c0)), wceq(cv(s0), nat1))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(csymg, c1))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
} = {
  eqtr3d(cfv(ccnv(c2), c0), nat1, cfv(ccnv(c2), cfv(c2, nat1)), wcel(c0, c1))
  fveq2d(ccnv(c2), cfv(c2, nat1), c0, wcel(c0, c1))
  fzto1stfv1(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(ccnv(c2), cfv(c2, nat1)), nat1), wf1o(c2, c1, c1), wcel(nat1, c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wf1o(c2, c1, c1), wcel(c2, c5))
  fzto1st(s0, c0, c1, c2, c5, c3, c4)
  symgbasf1o(c2, c5, c1, c4)
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(nat1, c1), wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, nat1)))
  eleq2s(c0, c1, co(nat1, cfz, c3), wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, nat1)))
  elfzuz2(c0, nat1, c3)
  syl6eleqr(nat1, c1, co(nat1, cfz, c3), wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, nat1)))
  eluzfz1(c3, nat1)
